title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Integration build 09/17. The Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog should not use text fields. It looks fine on Windows, but on Motif platforms (Solaris/AIX/HPUX), these text fields are displayed with automatic borders which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out even worse.
OB: On Motif platforms (Solaris/AIX/HPUX), the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders and different colored backgrounds, making them look like user input targets and stand out prominently.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should be created as readonly fields or labels instead, so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
